articles.author: Sopheng Cheang | AP
articles.title: Death toll surges as Cambodian building collapse search ends
articles.description: The death toll from the collapse of a building under construction in Cambodia has surged to 36, even as an additional survivor was pulled from rubble
articles.content:
Twenty-three people were found alive, according to a statement from Kep provincial authorities. It said that at least 13 women and six children were among the dead.
Women are often employed as construction workers in Cambodia and neighboring Thailand, but fa… [+1484 chars]

articles.author: Carolyn Hax
articles.title: Carolyn Hax: His daughter is moving, and he feels like he’s been sent packing
articles.description: Tell him you understand where he’s coming from, and see if he doesn’t come around.
articles.content: My husband cannot or will not see why they would want to move away from us. He does not see the positives for them and thinks it would be a huge mistake. I don't think it is a mistake, but even if it is, it is theirs to make. They are in their 30s and have wo… [+4101 chars]

articles.author: Nasser Karimi and Jon Gambrell, AP
articles.title: Soleimani's body arrives in Iran as Trump issues new threats
articles.description: The body of Revolutionary Guard Gen. Qassem Soleimani has arrived in Iran to throngs of mourners after the U.S. drone strike killed the commander
articles.content: TEHRAN, Iran The body of Revolutionary Guard Gen. Qassem Soleimani arrived Sunday in Iran to throngs of mourners after the U.S. drone strike killed the commander, as President Donald Trump threatened to bomb 52 sites in the Islamic Republic if Tehran retaliat… [+4638 chars]

articles.author: Zeke Miller | AP
articles.title: On foreign policy, Trump flouts risks that gave others pause
articles.description: President Donald Trump is not the first American leader to have Iranian Gen. Qassem Soleimani in his sights, but he was the first to pull the trigger
articles.content:
At times, he has simply been willing to embrace more risk. In other moments, he has questioned the validity of the warnings altogether, even from experts within his own administration. And he has publicly taken pride in doing so.
When Trump moved the U.S. Em… [+4529 chars]
